url_pattern_fix_required.issue: Article content uses /ratgeber/ paths but sitemap shows /pferde-ratgeber/ paths
url_pattern_fix_required.action_required: Update all internal links in final-article.md to use /pferde-ratgeber/ pattern for consistency with sitemap.xml

implementation_notes.anchor_text_strategy: Use natural, descriptive anchor text that matches user intent and target page content
implementation_notes.placement_priority: Place links contextually where they add genuine value to reader understanding
implementation_notes.link_distribution: Spread links across different H2 sections to avoid clustering
implementation_notes.avoid_over_optimization: Do not use exact-match keywords in all anchors - vary naturally
implementation_notes.technical_implementation: Use standard HTML <a> tags with relative paths for internal links

relevance_scoring_algorithm.methodology: Weighted scoring system to identify most strategic internal links

keyword_overlap.calculation: Count of shared keywords between source and target pages / Total unique keywords * 40

topic_cluster.calculation: Semantic relatedness score based on primary topics (horse health, buying, selling, valuation) * 30

h2_overlap.calculation: Number of matching H2 topic themes / Total H2 sections * 20

content_length.calculation: Target page content depth score (comprehensive pages score higher) * 10

relevance_scoring_algorithm.threshold: Links with total score >= 75 are considered strategic recommendations

url_pattern_consistency.requirement: All URLs must match sitemap.xml pattern
url_pattern_consistency.remediation: Fix required in final-article.md - update /ratgeber/ to /pferde-ratgeber/

anchor_text_diversity.value: 7 unique anchor texts, no exact duplicates
anchor_text_diversity.requirement: Natural, varied anchor text for each link

placement_distribution.value: Links distributed across 5 different H2 sections
placement_distribution.requirement: Avoid link clustering in single section

seo_impact_summary.topical_authority: Strengthens site authority on horse sales, AKU, and valuation topics through strategic clustering
seo_impact_summary.user_experience: Provides contextual navigation to relevant supporting content, reducing bounce rate
seo_impact_summary.link_equity_distribution: Distributes page authority to high-priority guide pages (AKU series, buying/selling guides)
seo_impact_summary.crawlability: Improves internal link structure for better search engine discovery of deep content
seo_impact_summary.conversion_optimization: Guides users through informational content toward conversion points (valuation tool)
